videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #01 - Introduction and What is Sass?
videos.description: Learn about Sass and Preprocessor and how they can help you in your projects

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #03 - Syntax and How to Install Sass
videos.description: Learn about all kind of sass syntaxes and how to install language in your OS

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #04 - Compile Style With All Methods
videos.description: Learn how to Compile the style with all methods and learn how to use command line

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #05 - Variables
videos.description:
Learn about Variables and how to work with it in your project

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #06 - Working in Action
videos.description: Start working with sass in action and start editing on of your projects

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #07 - Nesting
videos.description: Learn everything about nesting elements and save time and make your code clean

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #08 - Math and Operators
videos.description: Learn how to use Math and Operators in your style and learn how can they help you doing awesome things

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #09 - Extend
videos.description: Learn how to extend properties and use it again in your style with many examples

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #10 - Placeholder Selector
videos.description: Learn about the Placeholder Selector when extend class

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #11 - Import
videos.description: Learn how to import style with Sass and how it work

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #12 - Mixin
videos.description:
Learn how to use Mixin and reuse your code again in your style

PHP Function Arguments
https://youtu.be/xun8rR9ndiQ

Javascript Function Arguments
https://youtu.be/peEjHidbp5M﻿

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #13 - If Else Conditions
videos.description: Learn how to control flow by using if else condition in your style

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #14 - For Loop
videos.description: Learn the for loop and how to loop and creating as much classes as you need and use the power of loop in your style

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #15 - Create Simple Grid System
videos.description: Learn how to use what you have learnt to create Simple Grid System

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #16 - Each
videos.description: Learn Each and how to use it in your Code

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #17 - Each With Multiple Assignments
videos.description: Learn how to use Multiple Assignments with Each

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #18 - Each With Map
videos.description: Learn how to use Each with Map and create awesome styles

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #19 - While Loop
videos.description: Learn how to use While Loop to loop through your code and create awesome things in your style

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #20 - Training and Advanced Info
videos.description: Make Some Training + Advanced info

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #21 - Functions
videos.description: Learn about Functions and how to make function to help you doing things

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #22 - Output Style Options
videos.description: Learn about compiling style options and how to choose the right one for you

videos.title: Learn Sass in Arabic #23 - Using Koala & Course Outro
videos.description:
